data.title: The Mirror Has Two Faces (1996)
data.meta_description: Rose Morgan, who still lives with her mother, is a professor of Romantic Literature who desperately longs for passion in her life. Gregory Larkin, a mathematics professor, has been burned by passionate relationships and longs for a sexless union based on friendship and respect.
data.text:
"I never thought about what I would feel, I was only thinking about you. I only wanted to make you happy. I never thought I was good enough for you!"

"But ... you are good enough for me, Rose! You are, you are!"

"I know, I know, but Alex? You're not good enough for me."

I LOVE FEMINISM!

This has one of the funniest goofs I've ever seen. The scene in which Babs is leaving Pierce Brosnan you can see a crew guy in the mirror. Goofs happen all the time, who cares, but this one is so wonderful because not only is he standing there but he starts chugging a HUGE drink. Cinema, honestly.

A movie about a weird guy who is afraid of sex. Watching this I was like "what is this, my TWENTIES??" Three and a half stars!

Star ratings are kinda dumb right? I just love shouting them at the end, I'm torn though. Should I discontinue them? Should we all and just revert to cryptic reviews sans ratings or perhaps the binary like/lack of like system? Why do YOU use or not use star ratings?? Sound off in the comments boxheads!!

director Barbra Streisand: So Jeff, this is the last scene of the movie. Remember how in the script we kiss and the film abruptly ends?

Jeff Bridges: um-hum

B: Well I think maybe would be best if we extended it a little.

J: Uh ok

B: We could kiss..

J: yeah

B: and then maybe.. kiss.. some more?

J: Sure, if that's wh..

B: Heck let's just make out 'till the end of the credits! There's Bryan Adams, there's Puccini. A couple of 15min takes should do

J: 15 MINUTE TAKES??!

B: Yeah, you're so fiiinnneeesssuch a phenomenal actor I really want to make the most of it. F-for the audience, that is. Then maybe we can just grab a cab to my place? Don't mind the crew, DP'll know when to cut!

*grabs him*

J: Wait a min-

B: LIGHTS!
